infor.name: date-of-birth
infor.message:
Date of birth

The calculation will be based on complete years from the current date to the same date in your retirement year.

If you are using this modeller when it is close to your next birthday, you may wish to use your current age + 1.

infor.name: slider-retirement-age
infor.message:
Retirement Age

This is the message of retirement age.

infor.name: gender
infor.message:
Gender

One of the factors that is used to determine whether or not your funds will last long enough is an estimation of your expected mortality – how long you are likely to live.

Statistically, women live longer than men and will therefore require an income for longer.

infor.name: existing-fund-value
infor.message:
Existing fund value

You will be able to find this on your last annual statement. For a more up-to-date quotation, you can contact your pension provider.

infor.name: tax-free-cash
infor.message:
Tax free cash

This is the amount of your pension fund you have chosen to receive as a tax-free cash lump sum.

infor.name: target-pension
infor.message:
Target income

Enter the annual income amount that you think you will need to maintain your desired lifestyle when you retire.
